Sinopse: When a C.I.A. Agent is killed during a nuclear-arms purchase, his partner Oakes (Sir Anthony Hopkins), recruits his twin brother, Jake Hayes (Chris Rock), who had no idea he even had a twin brother, let alone that he worked for the C.I.A. Jake, aka Michael Turner, has 9 days to fill his brother's place. However, the enemy terrorists learn of his secret identity and kidnap his girlfriend/fiancée, and he must rescue her and save New York City from an imminent nuclear terrorist act.—Mikey J.
